about.paragraph1: Photography is more than just capturing images. It's about storytelling, preserving moments, and creating emotional connections through visual art.
about.paragraph2: Each project is approached with dedication, always seeking to deliver work that exceeds expectations and stands the test of time.
about.intro: I'm Tiago Damasceno, a photographer and graphic designer.
about.description1: I work with portraits, urban photography, nature, art, and event documentation, as well as creating modern visual identities and design pieces for brands, companies, and personal projects.
about.description2: My goal is to deliver work with style, artistic sensibility, and strong visual impact â€” both in photography and graphic design.
